Posts.Content: SisterSuewith2 wrote: Hello ladies.....I've completed my four rounds of dd A/C and am wondering when does the hair start growing back.  I'm getting a three week break before I start my next treatments.  Really missing the hair. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. Sue Sister Sue Dx 9/6/2007, IDC, 3cm, Stage IV, Grade 3, 23/27 nodes, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: When does the hair come back??? SisterSuewith2 Ggma
